snippet: The Minnesota State Mavericks have reached the national Division II semifinals without their coach, Todd Hoffner, who  missed the season because of legal charges that have now been dismissed.
abstract: Minnesota State has reached NCAA college football Division II semifinals without coach Todd Hoffner, who missed the 2012 season because of legal charges that have now been dismissed.
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota State Mavericks have reached the national Division II semifinals without their coach, Todd Hoffner, who  missed the season because of legal charges that have now been dismissed.

headline.seo: Minnesota St. in Division II Football Semifinal Without Coach Todd Hoffner
headline.print_headline:
Minnesota St. Succeeds
Without Its Usual Coach
